text: usane kaha, " vah kahata hain ki vah aisa gaay hai jo sadhaee huee nahin hai ki bhoomi jotatee ho, aur na vah khet ko paanee detee hai, theek-thaak hai, usamen kisee doosare rang kee milaavat nahin hai." bole, "ab tumane theek baat bataee hai." phir unhonne use zabh kiya, jabaki ve karana nahin chaahate the
